text: @realDonaldTrump Wtf...seriously. #coronavirus should be 100% your focus & since you've let Pence be the stoolie for the completely bungled handling of the situation progressing in the US & started standing in front of the podium, no one wants to hear thus crap except the bots #EnoughIsEnough
